item.title: cakephp 必须掌握的技巧
item.description: <td class="code"> <div class="container"> <div class="line number1 index0 alt2"> <code class="php variable" style="color: #aa7700 !important;">$this</code><code class="php plain">-&gt;pageTitle = </code><code class="php string" style="color: blue !important;">'Title of your page.'</code><code class="php plain">;</code> </div> </div> </td> </tr> </table> <td class="code"> <div class="container"> <div class="line number1 index0 alt2"> <code class="php variable" style="color: #aa7700 !important;">$this</code><code class="php plain">-&gt;_viewVars[</code><code class="php string" style="color: blue !important;">'somedata'</code><code class="php plain">] = </code><code class="php keyword" style="font-weight: bold !important; color: #006699 !important;">array</code><code class="php plain">(</code><code

item.title: CakePHP “Error: Database connection “Mysql” is missing, or could not be created”
item.description: sudo mkdir /var/mysql sudo ln -s ``/Applications/MAMP/tmp/mysql/mysql``.sock ``/var/mysql/mysql``.sock 完美解决了

item.title: cakephp 入门
item.description: CakePHP 2.x十分钟博客教程 http://www.ruiwant.com/cakephp2-blog-tutorials-part-1-installation-and-configuration.html 很不错的文章。 ———————————————————————————————————————————————————
